name: citation-hover
description: Shows evidence quotes when hovering over claim citations

citationHover.claimsFilePath.description: Relative path to the claims and evidence file from workspace root

citationHover.searchPattern.description: Glob pattern to search for claims file if not found at specified path

citationHover.extractedTextPath.description: Relative path to extracted text files from workspace root

citationHover.validationThreshold.description: Similarity threshold for fuzzy quote matching (0-1)

citationHover.showDiagnostics.description: Show diagnostic warnings for unverified quotes in claims_and_evidence.md
